data.name: Learn Python #1: Variables
data.description:
*This series is inspired by myjinxin2015's Traing JS series. I decided to make my own version in Python instead as it was only available in JavaScript.*

## Lesson #1
This first lesson will teach you about variables. Variables can store information in a program. They can be very easily created using this format.
``` python
variable = value
```

## Examples
``` python
message = "Hello World!"
lesson = 1
```
In this case, the variable with the name `message` has a value of `Hello World!` while the variable `lesson` has the value `1`. You may be asking what is the point of the double quotation marks, but that will be covered in Lesson 2.

## Your Mission
Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to create a variable called `name` with the value being your name, in quotation marks, and tha variable `age` with your age as a number, with no quotation marks.
